title: Bug 5340: Cancelling add exception breakpoint has no effect
OB: When adding an exception breakpoint in the breakpoints pane of the debug perspective, if the cancel button is clicked in the progress dialog, the dialog closes immediately and the exception is still added to the list. It should either honor the cancellation request or disable the cancel button.
EB: When cancelling the addition of an exception breakpoint, the progress dialog should close and the exception should not be added to the list.
SR: To reproduce: 1) Go to the breakpoints pane in the debug perspective. 2) Click the J! button to add an exception breakpoint. 3) In the progress dialog, click cancel.
